thread.section_title: Hotel d'Orsay - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient hotel for railway station
thread.title_full: Convenient hotel for railway station - Review of Hotel d'Orsay - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sue M
title: Convenient hotel for railway station
text: Arrived at 9pm. Concierge very helpful in recommending places to eat. Rooms very small but clean with ensuite. Breakfast excellent. Great coffee machine and plenty of fruit, yogurts and pastries. Just across canal from station making it easy to carry on with journey.
